• Credit management sales order is credit checked after the credit management master data is deleted for the business partner.

entry.title: Plan & Budget import financial data in Public cloud
entry.content:
Dear All,

I would like to import the WBS plan and budget into the system on an annual basis. Plan Category Type: PLN and BUDGET01
If data for the previous year has already been imported, and I would like to import only the Plan and Budget for the current year, after importing only the current year data, the Plan and Budget entries for the previous year disappear. How can we prevent the data from the previous year from disappearing?

Best regards,

Keratiya D.

entry.title: Upload of supplement and transfer budget in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear all,

I would like to enter additional budgets with monthly budget control. Currently, in the Supplement Budget entry screen, the system allows creating a budget for only one month per entry. Is there a screen or functionality that allows inputting budgets for multiple posting dates simultaneously?

Regards,

Keratiya D.

entry.content:

we are in Project for a SAP Rollout for our turkish Subsidiary. For that purpose we need to know how to add currency rates from TCMB (Turkish Central Bank) to Market Rates Refinity Date Service?


Can you please tell us how that's possible? Thank you in advance!

entry.title: How to delete the customer material by batch
entry.content: Dears, We are doing data migration, for customer materials, we imported with wrong number. Could you please advise which APP that we can mass change it, or delete the incorrect records? It's urgent, thank you very much in advance. Best Regards, Grace

entry.title: Request for Method to Delete or Adjust Transactions in In-House Bank Account Balances
entry.content:
We would like to confirm if there is a way to delete or adjust transactions registered in the in-house bank account balances.

When importing MT940 statements, we update the virtual account balances based on the information provided in the memo line.
However, in this case, incorrect information was included in the memo line, which resulted in an unintended transaction being created in the in-house bank account.

We would like to know if there is a way to correct this transaction.
For example, is it possible to create a reversal transaction for the same amount with the opposite sign, or to invalidate the transaction in some way?

Thank you for your support.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

How to solve this issue.

Keratiya D.

entry.title: Unable access to "Create Maintenance Notification" App in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2502
entry.content:
I would like to ask for your guidance regarding access to the "Create Maintenance Notification" app in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition (release 2502).

Currently, I am unable to find or access the app. Could you please advise:

- Whether any specific scope item needs to be activated?

- What business role(s) or catalog(s) are required?

- Any additional configuration or steps needed to enable access?

Thank you in advance for your support. Looking forward to your response.

entry.title: When send a soap request via VBA error occurred: The download of the specified resource has failed
entry.content:
Dear SAP expert,

When we run VBA code, the following error occurs sometimes：

 

This error can be fixed in the following ways, but there is no guarantee that it will continue to occur:

1. Sometimes it succeeds when executed consecutively for the second time

2. Sometimes comment out the message code ->Run ->Error 500->Restore comment code ->Run successfully

3. Other uncertain ways

PS：As long as it runs successfully once, there will generally be no more errors on the same day

Don’t know if there are certain way to resolve the issue.

Best regards,

Joey

entry.title: Recording Additional Costs on a Purchase Order in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
entry.content:
Hello,

I need to create an invoice with additional costs. I have a Purchase Order (PO) with Supplier A, who has already submitted their invoice. Then, I need to create another invoice to Supplier B associated with the same purchase order, covering additional costs such as freight or customs.

Could you please advise on the options available in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition, to record these additional costs and properly associate the invoices with the original purchase order?

Thank you very much for your guidance.

entry.title: Unable to Edit or Delete Line in SSCUI 101045 – Bank Determination Configuration Blocked
entry.content:
Hi all,

We are experiencing an issue in the SSCUI “Set Up Bank Determination for Payment Transactions” (101045) for company code 3110. Specifically, under the "Bank Accounts" section, we are unable to edit or delete a particular line that is partially filled.

The blocking line is:

  • House Bank = CIUD 
  • Payment method = C
  • Currency = ARS
  • Account = 973/5

The system throws the error:
"Specify both accounts or none at all",
and prevents us from saving any changes in the table, effectively blocking the entire configuration.

In SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud, we previously resolved this issue by activating debug mode (/h) and manually removing the problematic line from the table. However, in Public Cloud, we do not have access to perform such an action.

We kindly request your assistance in:

  • Unlocking or removing the affected entry from the table

  • Or providing a workaround to proceed with the configuration

Please let us know if further information or screenshots are needed.

I attache images of the issue.

Best regards,

Blas Roselló

SAP Consultant

entry.title: Extract data from S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition using SAP Data Services (BODS)
entry.content:
I assume the "Migrate your data" app is the only option to perform the initial data load into SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition . Does this mean that IDoc or BAPI-based data loads (by calling them from SAP Data Services) are not supported?

Additionally, I'm hoping to extract SAP table data from SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition  using SAP Data Services with a data store connection established via a cloud connector. Is this a feasible approach?

entry.title: Handling inventory updates from EWM to S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition in 7L1 integration scenario
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

I’m working on an integration between SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition and SAP EWM on Private Cloud, using the 7L1 scope item and communication scenario SAP_COM_0A58.

The standard delivery-based processes (inbound, outbound, stock transport orders) are working fine. However, we’re facing challenges with warehouse-driven updates that need to be reflected back in ERP.

Examples of limitations we’re encountering:

  • Pick Denial
    When picking in EWM is partially denied, the reduced quantity is not reflected in the outbound delivery in ERP. This can cause inconsistencies in fulfillment and invoicing.

  • Physical Inventory Differences
    When a cycle count is processed and differences are posted in EWM, the updated stock quantity is not synchronized back to ERP. The ERP stock remains unchanged.

  • Ready for Shipping status
    When the goods are packed or staged in EWM, the “Ready for Shipping” status is not updated in the ERP delivery.

According to SAP Note 3629180:

SAP clearly states these processes are not supported in the standard 7L1 integration.

I’ve come across several discussions and documents suggesting that these types of updates could be solved via custom SAP Cloud Integration (CPI) flows for example, by pushing events from EWM and updating ERP via exposed APIs.

My question:

  • Is CPI indeed the recommended workaround for synchronizing EWM status and inventory changes to ERP in this scenario?

  • Are there any best practices, alternative approaches, or roadmap items to cover these types of back-synchronizations?

  • How are other customers or partners solving this in mixed EWM decentralized + S/4HANA Public Cloud environments?

Any guidance or insights would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Physical inventory document not split by subcontractor (special stock O) in version 2508
entry.content:
When creating physical inventory documents, the system does not split the documents by subcontractor (special stock type O).
Is this the expected behavior in the current version?
I seem to recall that the documents were split by subcontractor in versions prior to 2508.

entry.title: What is the standard process to adjust the actual cost for professional service project
entry.content:
Our Public Cloud customer use professional service projects.

They have a business process question, for an example:

The cost rate maintained for project manager Bob is 2000CNY/days. If time recording for Bob is 10 days this month. The final cost in the billing will be 2000*10=20000CNY.

But in the end of month, the actual cost is 1700CNY/days via the finance settlement. Could you help to suggest what is the standard process to adjust the actual cost?

Is this via APP: Reassign Costs and Revenues or other solution?

entry.title: Person Responsible in Lease contract management
entry.content:
Recently we have deleted a user which was entered in Person Responsible in Contract. We had to manually change person responsible one by one for 300 contracts, since the user id dont exist anymore.

  1. Is there any option to mass change the field?
  2. In future if a user leaves organization, we need to remove the user? In this case how can we deal with it?

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: How to reverse ERS related goods receipt documents
entry.content:
Dears,

We met a ERS related problem. We used ERS Evaluated Receipt Settlement function, post goods receipt, and through APP "schedule supplier invoice jobs", to schedule ERS jobs, post invoice automatically by job.

But today, we found the purchase order is incorrect, need to reverse the invoice and goods receipt.

When we tried to reverse the invoice, we found the error message "M8.414", the message said, if you want invoice creation completely using ERS, then you must cancel the goods receipt and not the invoice document. ERS will then create the relevant cancellation invoice document for the cancelled goods movement". 

However, when we use APP "post goods movement" to cancel the goods receipt document, system also generated the error message "M7021 Deficit PU IR Quantity  XXXXX".

Could you please guide how to reverse ERS related goods movement document? Is it another APP? 

Thank you very much.

Best Regards,

Grace

entry.content:

Perhaps some of you have already had experience with this or can provide me with links to instructions or tips?

Thanks a lot!

entry.title: BADI to pick user name from the user ID in COUNT_LIST output form
entry.content:
Hi,

We have a requirement to display the username in the PI count output format rather than the username which is given in the standard form. We have created a custom field, assigned it to the custom layout and tried using the BADI- INV10_LIST_OF_STOCKS_FORM_I. However, we are unable to get the username.

Please advise.

Thanks,

Ruwani
